segments.text: Are you ready for the big competition today , Todd ? The winner gets two tickets to the Sydney Olympics !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Steve , I was born ready ! I ’ m going to blow you guys off the treadmill today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ Ve still got a lot of time before we have to start running .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s hit the whirlpool for a bit . It ’ ll help me loosen up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You bet . I used to take a whirlpool almost every night back home .
segments.speaker: S1
